createMatch

Creates a match between a triple, the previous match and the current one.

Parameters:
t - triple pattern.
previous - previous match
current - current match.
Returns:
new Match instance.

progressIndex

protected static int progressIndex(int begin,
                                   int[] indexes,
                                   TripleSet[] sets)
Progresses an index array starting from the begin pointer, returning -1 whether the progress sequence has been ended.

Parameters:
begin - pointer with the next index to be increased.
indexes - list of indexes.
sets - list of sets providing the upper bounds of every index.
Returns:
the next index to be updated.
